author: Xbox
description:
Earn more rewards with Xbox Game Pass when playing or buying games. Play and earn up to $100 a year in the Store with Rewards.

This is how we play now. 

Join Xbox Game Pass https://xbox.com/gamepass

Terms apply. Select markets only. Rewards vary by Xbox Game Pass plan and Rewards level. Gameplay rewards for 18+.

author: Xbox
description:
Heroes of Ancaria! Sacred 2 Remaster is out now!
The legendary action RPG returns with upgraded visuals, smoother combat, and every expansion included.

Whether you first explored Ancaria twenty years ago or are discovering it for the first time: this is the ultimate way to experience Sacred 2’s massive open world, alive with quests, dungeons, and countless opportunities for mayhem!

https://www.xbox.com/games/store/sacred-2-remaster/9pl5djcqq4n0
